casebody.data:
H.F., Petitioner-Movant,
v.
BOARD OF EDUCATION OF the TOWNSHIP OF TEANECK, Respondent-Respondent. M-1197/1198/1200 September Term 2017
080011 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 21, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motions for leave to proceed as an indigent (M-1197)

and to file a motion for leave to appeal as within time (M-1198) are granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal (M-1200) is denied.
